item.title: Log4Shell
item.description: The widely-used java logging library, Log4j, has an unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE) and denial of service vulnerability if a user-controlled string is logged. This could allow the attacker full control of the affected server or allow an attacker to conduct a denial of service attack.
